wikipedia_page.main: Hilda Phoebe Hudson (11 June 1881  Cambridge – 26 November 1965 London) was an English mathematician who worked on algebraic geometry, in particular on Cremona transformations. Hudson was interested in the link between mathematics and her religious beliefs.

response: * Hilda Phoebe Hudson (1881–1965), English researcher on Cremona transformations in algebraic geometry
